column5: English
column11: English

column4:
あれは……
/c5コマンドティーガー/c3！？
column5:
Those are...
/c5Commando Tigers/c3!?
column11:
Those are...
/c5Commando Tigers/c3!?

column4:
ベルソン重工が発表した
軍事用マリオネーションギア
だよ。
column5: That's the military Marionation Gear that Bellson Industries announced.
column11: The military Marionation Gear that was announced by Bellson Industries.

column4:
オートメーションによる量産化
を、世界ではじめて成功させた
人形。
column5: They're the result of the world's first-ever successful attempt at automated Puppet mass production.
column11: The mechs that were created after the first ever successful attempt with automated mass production.

column4:
工場のベルトコンベアーで
生まれる、冷たい戦闘機械さ。
column5: They're ruthless fighting machines born from a conveyor belt in a factory.
column11: They're ruthless fighting machines born from a convey belt in a factory.

column4:
だけど、完成したばかりのはず
なのに、もうこんな数が作られ
ているなんて……。
column5: I'd heard that the process was only just completed, but they've already managed to make so many of them...
column11: Although, I heard that it had only just been completed, and yet they've already managed to make such a number of them...

column5: They're headed our way!
column11: They're headed our way!

column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中苦しい

嫌な予感がする。
とりあえず、引き返した方が
よさそうだ。
column5:
I've got a bad feeling about this.
We'd better just turn back for now.
column11:
I've got a bad feeling about this.
For now, it looks like it'd be best just to turn back.

column5: Something's coming!
column11: Something's coming!

column5: ...So, that's what happened.
column11: ...So that's how is is.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣
ガロイ親方＿戦闘中苦しい
光があれば影もある……か。
column5: Where there is light, there must also be shadows...I suppose.
column11: Where there is light, there must be also be shadows, eh...?

column4:
人形技術の大いなる進歩。
だが、大いなる発展は、
時として深い闇を生む。
column5: It's a huge step forward for Puppet technology. But great progress can give rise to profound darkness.
column11: It's a huge step forward for mech technology. But, great progress sometimes gives rise to profound darkness.

column5: What's that supposed to mean?
column11: What's that supposed to mean?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

ちょうど今、街の連中と、
その問題を話し合って
きたところなんだ。
column5: I'm talking about the problem we face now that those guys are in the city.
column11: I'm talking about the question we face with that troupe in the city right now.

column4:
お前らが出会ったのは、
おそらく
独立人形軍“/c5ナイトシェイド/c3”。
column5: What you encountered was probably the Independent Puppet Army, {/c5Nightshade/c3}.
column11: What you encountered was probably the Independent Mech Army, “/c5Night Shade/c3”.

column5: Nightshade?
column11: Night Shade?

column4:
金のためなら何でもやる
悪名高い傭兵部隊だ。
column5: They're a notorious unit of mercenary soldiers who'll do anything for the right price.
column11: They're a notorious unit of mercenary soldiers who'll do anything, for the right price.

column4:
独立人形軍なんて名乗っちゃ
いるが、要するに軍隊くずれ
の戦闘集団さ。
column5: Their {Independent Puppet Army} is really just a band of fighters formed after the military's collapse.
column11: They might call themselves the 'Independent Mech Army', but in reality they're just a group of fighters formed after the military collapse.

column4:
問題は、最近やつらが大量の
マリオネーションギアを手に
入れた、ということだ。
column5: The problem is that they've recently gotten their hands on a whole bunch of Marionation Gear.
column11: The problem is that they recently got their hands on a large number of Marionation Gears.

column4:
その数、５０以上。
もはや軍隊以上の戦力だ。
column5:
There are at least 50 of them.
That means they already have more firepower than the military.
column11:
The actual count is no less than 50.
That means their fire power is already greater than the military.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中苦しい

強大な力を持つようになった
彼らを、誰も止めることは
できない。
column5: Now that they've obtained such mighty power, there's no one who can stop them.
column11: Now that they've obtained such mighty power, there's no one who can stop them.

column4:
どの街でも、
やりたい放題らしい。
column5: No matter the city, they can do as they please.
column11: No matter the city, they can do as they please.

column4:
先日、ラトラパントでやつらが
暴れまわった。マリオネーショ
ンギアに乗ってな。
column5: The other day, they went on a rampage in Rattrapante in their Marionation Gear.
column11: The other day, they went on a rampage in Rattrapante, riding in Marionation Gear.

column4:
街の被害は相当なものらしい。
だが、警察もやつらに
手が出せん。
column5: Apparently, they caused considerable damage, but even the police couldn't cope with them.
column11: It seems like they caused a substantial amount of damage, but, even the police aren't able to cope with them.

column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中軽い驚きＬ

column5: No way...
column11: No way...

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

この街でも
対策を考えることになった。
column5: Even this town's had to start thinking about how to counter them.
column11: I've been thinking about possible counter-measures.

column4:
今回のお前の判断は正しい。
関わらなくて正解だ。
column5:
Your judgement before was correct.
It's better not to get involved.
column11:
Your judgement before was correct.
It's better not to get involved.

column4:
もしナイトシェイドとトラブル
があっても、/pや
アンマリーを関わらせるなよ。
column5: If Nightshade starts to cause trouble, neither /p nor Anne-Marie should intervene.
column11: If Night Shade start to cause trouble, neither /p nor Anne-Marie should intervene.

column4:
ナイトシェイドは
冷酷無比な戦闘のプロだ。
column5: Nightshade are cold-blooded fighting pros without equal.
column11: Night Shade are cold-blooded and unparalleled fighting pros.

column4:
フェアプレイ精神なんて、
これっぽっちも
持ち合わせちゃいない。
column5: They don't have the slightest intention of playing fair.
column11: They won't have the slightest intention of playing fair.

column4:
子供同士の人形遊びとは違う。
ちょっとでも手を出したら最後、
やつらは大軍で襲ってくるぞ。
column5: This is no longer child's play. If anyone pokes their nose in, they'll hunt us down with a mighty army.
column11: This is no longer child's play. No sooner than someone pokes their nose in, they'll hunt us down with a mighty army.

column4:
甘い相手じゃない。
わかったな。
column5:
They'll have no mercy.
Am I making myself clear?
column11:
They'll have no mercy.
Am I making myself clear?

column5: ...Crystal.
column11: ...Crystal.
